results.name: Quest for Glory 4 1/2: So You Thought You Were a Hero?

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: Quad core 2.6GHz x64-compatible
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 Ti or ATI Radeon™ HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: Quad core 2.6GHz x64-compatible
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia gtx 960 or ATI Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
